title: DroidSet Free v2.3.4 (Android 2.1+)
description:
DROIDSET FREE v2.3.4 (Android 2.1+) Installer



DroidSet allows you to manage settings on Android phones by providing quick toggling functionality. These functionality allow you to enable or disable Wi-Fi, mobile network, GPS, Bluetooth, screen orientation, flight mode and much more at a touch of a button. When the functionality is activated, you will be presented with some information regarding that functionality.

You can install the APK found in this torrent (See instructions below) or install it from https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=au.com.ckd.droidsetfree&hl=en.

IMPORTANT: Google has removed the ability to toggle mobile network from Android 5.0. Customers who do not wish to lose this functionality, please refrain from upgrading your device to Android 5.0. See Google's decision at https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=78084.


-------------
What's new:
-------------
v2.3.4:
a. Update lock and unlock functions.
Folks: You will need to reconfigure these functions again as there have been many changes. Sorry.
b. Bug fix.
- Flight mode function.
- Menu crash due to firmware's outdated library.
Note: May not work on all Android 4.2 devices. Google, device manufacturers, or service providers should fix this issue themselves by releasing a firmware upgrade for Android 4.2 devices.
- Other fixes.


--------------------------
Prerequisite requirement:
--------------------------
1. An unrooted or rooted Android device. Note: Some features might not work if you don't have a rooted device.
2. Android 2.1 (Eclair) and up.


--------------------------
Steps to install the APK:
--------------------------

1. On Android 2 and 3, go to Settings | Applications and tick Unknown Sources.

On Android 4, 5 and 6 go to Settings | Security and tick Unknown Sources.


2. Copy the APK onto phone's internal SD card using a Wifi program or directly via the phone's USB connection.


3. Use a file manager like (Astro File Manager, Root Explorer, etc) to browse to location of saved APK.


4. Tap on APK to install.


Enjoy
